channel.title: openbsd on Stigatle.no
channel.description: Recent content in openbsd on Stigatle.no

item.title: Current status on things
item.description: I wanted to post a bit about what I’m doing currently. It’s been a while since I’ve updated my blog. Not sure if anyone reads it anyways, but I like to sit down and write a bit every once in a while.. First - I’ve been wanting to replace Twitter\X with something else, so I looked around for activitypub software that I could host by my self, and I then found Snac2 - https://codeberg.
